mapper.select: SELECT MM.ID AS userId, MM.PW AS userPwd, MM.NAME AS userName, MM.PWINITIAL as pwInitial, MM.COMPANY_CODE AS cmCode, CM.COMPANY_NAME AS cmName, GR.GRADE_NAME AS grName, DP.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS dpName, MM.MAIL AS userMail, DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AS dpCode, MM.ADMIN as admin FROM MM INNER JOIN CM ON MM.COMPANY_CODE=CM.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN GR ON GR.GRADE_CODE=MM.GRADE_CODE INNER JOIN DP ON DP.COMPANY_CODE=MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE = MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE WHERE ID=#{userId}

SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS dmNum, DM.COMPANY_CODE AS cmCode, DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS dmTitle, DM.APPROVAL_CODE AS apCode, DM.DOCUMENT_CODE AS dmCode, MM.ID AS dmWriteId, MM.NAME AS dmWriter, DM.DOCUMENT_DATE AS dmDate FROM DM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.WRITER = MM.ID AND DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE WHERE DM.COMPANY_CODE=#{cmCode} AND DOCUMENT_NUM LIKE '%'|| #{dmNum} ||'%' AND MM.NAME LIKE '%'|| #{dmWriter} ||'%' AND DOCUMENT_TITLE LIKE '%'|| #{dmTitle} ||'%' AND DOCUMENT_CODE LIKE '%'|| #{dmCode} ||'%' AND APPROVAL_CODE = 'C' AND DOCUMENT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{dmDate},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{dmDate2},'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT DISTINCT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", APS.APPROVAL_NAME AS "apName", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM MM INNER JOIN DM ON MM.COMPANY_CODE = DM.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN APS ON DM.APPROVAL_CODE = APS.APPROVAL_CODE WHERE WRITER = #{dmWriteId} AND DOCUMENT_CODE='D'

SELECT DISTINCT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", APS.APPROVAL_NAME AS "apName", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM MM INNER JOIN DM ON MM.COMPANY_CODE = DM.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN APS ON DM.APPROVAL_CODE = APS.APPROVAL_CODE WHERE WRITER = #{dmWriteId} AND DOCUMENT_CODE='E'

SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM DM INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM = AL.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DM.WRITER=MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE = DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.APPROVAL_CODE = 'P' AND AL.SIGN_LOCATION IS NULL AND AL.APPROVAL_ID=#{apId} AND AL.APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK='P' AND AL.APPROVAL_SEQ>=(SELECT MIN(APPROVAL_SEQ) FROM AL WHERE SIGN_LOCATION IS NULL AND APPROVAL_ID=#{apId})

SELECT DISTINCT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate", AL.APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK AS "aplSeqCheck" FROM DM INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM = AL.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DM.WRITER=MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE=DS.DOCUMENT_CODE INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM=AL.DOCUMENT_NUM WHERE DM.APPROVAL_CODE = 'P' AND AL.APPROVAL_ID = #{apId} AND AL.APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK='C' AND AL.SIGN_LOCATION IS NOT NULL

SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM DM INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM = AL.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DM.WRITER=MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE=DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.APPROVAL_CODE = 'C' AND AL.APPROVAL_ID = #{apId}

SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM DM INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM = AL.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DM.WRITER=MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE=DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.APPROVAL_CODE = 'R' AND AL.APPROVAL_ID = #{apId}

SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM DM INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM = AL.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DM.WRITER=MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE=DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.APPROVAL_CODE = 'D' AND AL.APPROVAL_ID = #{apId}

SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM DM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE AND DM.WRITER=MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE=DS.DOCUMENT_CODE INNER JOIN RF ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM=RF.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN RD ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM=RD.DOCUMENT_NUM WHERE RF.REFERENCE_ID=#{refpId} OR RD.READER_ID=#{readingId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TL (DOCUMENT_NUM, WRITER, DOCUMENT_TITLE, DOCUMENT_DATE, COMPANY_CODE, DOCUMENT_CODE) VALUES(CONCAT(#{cmCode}, TEMP_SEQ.NEXTVAL), #{dmWriteId}, #{dmTitle}, SYSDATE, #{cmCode}, #{dmCode})
mapper.select: SELECT DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate" FROM TL WHERE WRITER = #{dmWriteId} AND DOCUMENT_TITLE = #{dmTitle} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{cmCode}
SELECT DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum" FROM TL WHERE WRITER = #{dmWriteId} AND DOCUMENT_TITLE = #{dmTitle} AND COMPANY_CODE = #{cmCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE TL SET DOCUMENT_TITLE = #{dmTitle}, DOCUMENT_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE) WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM = #{dmNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT (DOCUMENT_NUM, APPROVAL_CODE, FILE_LOCATION, WRITER, DOCUMENT_TITLE, DOCUMENT_DATE, COMPANY_CODE, DOCUMENT_CODE) VALUES (#{dmNum}, 'P', #{fileLoc}, #{dmWriter}, #{dmTitle}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(TO_timestamp(#{dmDate}), 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), #{cmCode}, #{dmCode})
INSERT INTO APPROVALLINE (APPROVAL_ID, APPROVAL_SEQ, DOCUMENT_NUM, SIGN_LOCATION, APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK) VALUES(#{dmWriter}, '1', #{dmNum}, #{signLoc}, 'C')
INSERT INTO APPROVALLINE (APPROVAL_ID, APPROVAL_SEQ, DOCUMENT_NUM, APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK) VALUES(#{dmWriter}, #{aplSeq}, #{dmNum}, 'P')
INSERT INTO APPROVALLINE (APPROVAL_ID, APPROVAL_SEQ, DOCUMENT_NUM, APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK) VALUES(#{dmWriter}, #{aplSeq}, #{dmNum}, 'W')
mapper.select: SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmTitle", DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS "dmNum", DM.FILE_LOCATION AS "fileLoc", DM.DOCUMENT_DATE AS "dmDate", DM.APPROVAL_CODE AS " apCode", MM.NAME AS "dmWriter", AL.APPROVAL_ID AS "apId", AL.APPROVAL_SEQ AS "aplSeq", AL.SIGN_LOCATION AS "signLoc", AL.RECEIVER AS "receiver", DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS "dmName" FROM DM INNER JOIN AL ON DM.DOCUMENT_NUM = AL.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.WRITER = MM.ID INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE=DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNumCheck}
SELECT RF.DOCUMENT_NUM AS"dmNum", MM.NAME AS "rdName", RF.REFERENCE_ID AS "rdId" FROM RF INNER JOIN MM ON RF.REFERENCE_ID=MM.ID WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum}
SELECT AL.SIGN_LOCATION AS "aplLocation", AL.APPROVAL_SEQ AS "aplSeq" FROM AL WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum}
SELECT DP.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "dpName" FROM MM INNER JOIN DP ON MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND MM.COMPANY_CODE = DP.COMPANY_CODE WHERE ID = #{apId}

SELECT DISTINCT MM.NAME AS "aplName", DP.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "dpName", GR.GRADE_NAME AS "grName", AL.APPROVAL_SEQ AS "aplSeq" FROM AL INNER JOIN MM ON AL.APPROVAL_ID = MM.ID INNER JOIN DM ON AL.DOCUMENT_NUM = DM.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN DP ON MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND MM.COMPANY_CODE = DP.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN GR ON MM.GRADE_CODE = GR.GRADE_CODE WHERE AL.DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum} ORDER BY AL.APPROVAL_SEQ

SELECT DISTINCT MM.NAME AS "acName", DP.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "dpName", GR.GRADE_NAME AS "grName", AC.APPROVAL_COMMENT AS "acContents", AC.APPROVAL_DATE AS "acDate" FROM AC INNER JOIN MM ON AC.APPROVAL_WRITER = MM.ID INNER JOIN DM ON AC.DOCUMENT_NUM = DM.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN DP ON MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND MM.COMPANY_CODE = DP.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN GR ON MM.GRADE_CODE = GR.GRADE_CODE WHERE AC.DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum}

SELECT DISTINCT MM.NAME AS "cpName", DP.DEPARTMENT_NAME AS "dpName", GR.GRADE_NAME AS "grName", COD.COMPANION_COMMENT AS "cpContents", COD.COMPANION_DATE AS "cpDate" FROM COD INNER JOIN MM ON COD.COMPANION_WRITER = MM.ID INNER JOIN DM ON COD.DOCUMENT_NUM = DM.DOCUMENT_NUM INNER JOIN DP ON MM.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DP.DEPARTMENT_CODE AND MM.COMPANY_CODE = DP.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN GR ON MM.GRADE_CODE = GR.GRADE_CODE WHERE COD.DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum}

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM AL WHERE APPROVAL_ID=#{apId} AND DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum} AND (SELECT APPROVAL_SEQ FROM AL WHERE APPROVAL_ID = #{apId} AND DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum}) = (SELECT MAX(APPROVAL_SEQ) FROM AL WHERE DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE AL SET APPROVAL_SEQ_CHECK='P' WHERE APPROVAL_SEQ= (SELECT APPROVAL_SEQ FROM AL WHERE APPROVAL_ID = #{apId} AND DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum} )+'1' AND DOCUMENT_NUM=#{dmNum}
